Text:
'Packager' mod built. Please restart the game and enable the built mod.
<RedHighlight>Do not disable this mod.</RedHighlight>
If you want to build the mod again (for example, after changing mods that give/remove items), simply disable the built mod and the button will appear again.
Combines 10× of any supported good into a single package
Born from necessity, perfected by neat freaks. Where there's clutter, there's a Bundler.
Unpacks a package back into 10× individual goods.
Nothing delights a beaver more than unboxing the unexpected.
